info.name: 10 Minute Mail / Dark Theme
info.description:
This is a dark theme for 10minutemail.com
It MAKE TEMPORARY MAIL GREAT AGAIN!

** Download font 7barsp at notes **

这是10分钟邮箱的夜间主题。
让临时邮箱再次伟大！（什么鬼xdddddddddd）
别忘了下载note处标明的数码管字体。
info.additionalInfo:
If you wanna get the 7bar font that used in this style you will need to download it manually. I have no ssl web server to make it auto done. Sorry for that.
如果你想看见计时器的数码管主题的话你需要点下面那个链接手动下载这个字体。我没有ssl安全服务器所以没办法设置自动下载。就酱。
Download / 下载:
http://ao.acg.ac/Documents/fonts/7barsp.ttf

Release log
[2017/2/25]
[+]Apply theme to mail list
[+]Add unread effect

[2017/2/23]
[+]Init
